text: Manius Otacilius Crassus was a Roman consul of Samnite origins and served during the Punic Wars. His consular colleague in 263 BC was Manius Valerius Maximus Corvinus Messalla,Polybius, 1.16 and in 246 BC his colleague was Marcus Fabius Licinus. == See also == * Otacilia (gens) ==References== Category:Roman Republican consuls Category:3rd-century BC Romans Category:3rd- century BC deaths Category:Otacilii Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death uncertain
title: Manius Otacilius Crassus
